data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in B. Munich.
In the minute 1, Frank Willenborg awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in high up the field for 1. FC Cologne in Cologne.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for 1. FC Cologne close to the penalty box.
Important block from the B. Munich defence as Ismail Jakobs fires in a strike for 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 7, 1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 10, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 12, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for B. Munich.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Thomas Muller.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 15, B. Munich to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, 1. FC Cologne's Ismail Jakobs misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for B. Munich at RheinEnergieStadion.
Frank Willenborg awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in the half of B. Munich.
Benjamin Pavard (B. Munich) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 26, 1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Cologne, 1. FC Cologne push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to B. Munich.
In the minute 29, Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting (B. Munich) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 32, 1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Free kick B. Munich.
In the minute 36, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 39, Joshua Kimmich (B. Munich) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 41, Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Throw-in for B. Munich close to the penalty box.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 43, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
Frank Willenborg awards the home team a throw-in.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Frank Willenborg awards the away team a throw-in.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Cologne.
Great finish from Serge Gnabry to give B. Munich a 0-2 lead.
Frank Willenborg has blown to start the second-half.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 47, B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
B. Munich's Serge Gnabry goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 50, Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Frank Willenborg signals a B. Munich throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
1. FC Cologne's Marius Wolf breaks free at RheinEnergieStadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Frank Willenborg awards B. Munich a goal kick.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 55, 1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
Ismail Jakobs of 1. FC Cologne gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 56, B. Munich have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 59, 1. FC Cologne needs to be cautious. B. Munich have an attacking throw-in.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
The home team replace Jannes Horn with Noah Katterbach.
The home team have replaced Dimitris Limnios with Jan Thielmann. This is the second substitution made today by Markus Gisdol.
In the minute 59, Dominick Drexler is replacing Ellyes Skhiri for the home team.
In Cologne 1. FC Cologne attack through Salih Ozcan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in Cologne.
Frank Willenborg signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Frank Willenborg signals a throw-in for B. Munich, close to 1. FC Cologne's area.
In the minute 63, Joshua Zirkzee is on a sub for Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting for B. Munich.
B. Munich make their second substitution with Douglas Costa replacing Leroy Sane.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside 1. FC Cologne's half?
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
In the minute 65, Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 67, Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
1. FC Cologne have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
In Cologne, Ismail Jakobs (1. FC Cologne) misses the target with a header.
Frank Willenborg awards B. Munich a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Throw-in B. Munich.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
Frank Willenborg signals a B. Munich throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
David Alaba is replacing Javi Martinez for B. Munich at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 79, Markus Gisdol (1. FC Cologne) is making a fourth substitution, with Toluwalase Emmanuel Arokodare replacing Sebastian Andersson.
Frank Willenborg awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, 1. FC Cologne are back in the match in Cologne. Dominick Drexler has scored to make it 1-2.
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
In Cologne, Toluwalase Emmanuel Arokodare (1. FC Cologne) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 86, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne.
B. Munich push upfield but Frank Willenborg quickly pulls them for offside.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
In the minute 89, Throw-in high up the field for 1. FC Cologne in Cologne.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
Marius Wolf (1. FC Cologne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Frank Willenborg signals a throw-in for B. Munich, close to 1. FC Cologne's area.
Frank Willenborg will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick B. Munich.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
1. FC Cologne needs to be cautious. B. Munich have an attacking throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Marc Roca is replacing Serge Gnabry for the away team.
